Protocols/VCTest.html#/s:6Armory6VCTestP.abstract: Convenience that performs one pass through the run loop for the current thread

Protocols/VCTest.html#/s:6Armory6VCTestP.abstract: Convenience that asserts the presented view controller is dismissed

Protocols/VCTest.html#/s:6Armory6VCTestP.name: tap(_:)

Protocols/VCTest.html#/s:6Armory6VCTestP.abstract: Returns cell of provided type from the given UICollectionView instance
